A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: They have taken our beloved Star Wars and basically ruined it. Horrendous continuity gaps. story-line twists throughout that were written for the sake of story-line twists. There is too much to cover in one review\, but I can state that I hated it and found it upsetting that Star Wars has been taken in this farcical direction. If I could get my ticket money back\, I wouldn't hesitate.
